AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Cheap Destroyer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was summoned through a dimensional rift by Sinister forces, to quickly attack vulnerable targets at close range. Her hull integrates technology well beyond our understanding.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Light Destroyer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was summoned though a dimensional rift by Sinister Forces, to quickly attack vulnerable targets at close range. Her hull integrates technology beyond our current understanding.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Light Cruiser
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was summoned though a dimensional rift by Sinister Forces, to provide medium range fire support. Her hull integrates technology beyond our current understanding.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Destroyer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was summoned though a dimensional rift by Sinister Forces, to quickly attack vulnerable targets at close range. Her hull integrates technology beyond our current understanding.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Erratic Sinister Destroyer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was summoned through a dimensional rift by Sinister Forces, and her AI matrix exhibits some behavioral irregularities.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Destroyer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [[PAWN_nameDef] was summoned though a dimensional rift by Sinister Forces, to quickly attack vulnerable targets at close range. Her hull integrates technology beyond our current understanding.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister salvaged Destroyer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was hastily built by Sinister Forces, from the wreckage of their advanced models, to quickly attack vulnerable targets at close range.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Swarm Destroyer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was cheaply built by Sinister Forces, to swarm larger targets in close combat.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Swarm Destroyer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was summoned through a dimensional rift Sinister Forces, to quickly attack vulnerable targets at close range.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Summoned Cruiser
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was summoned through a dimensional rift by Sinister Forces, to attack targets at medium range.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Hotrod
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by a Sinister leader, as paer of an evolutionary experiment.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Prototype Destroyer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by Sinister scientists. Her neural matrix ehibits some unusual properties.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Picket Ship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was created by Sinister Forces, to protect their battleships from enemy destroyers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Escort
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was created by Sinister Forces, to protect their battleships from enemy fighters.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Raider
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by Sinister Forces, to counter enemy battleships.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Heavy Cruiser
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by Sinister Forces, to rush enemy battleships.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Hotrod
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by a Sinister department head, as an evolutionary research experiment.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Hotrod
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by an Sinister lord, as a personal vanity project.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Servant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by a Sinister Prophet, as a personal messenger.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Hotrod
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by an Sinister lord, as a personal vanity project.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Mail Ship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was summoned through a sinister dimensional gateway. While she seem to be designed to serve as a simple mail ship, her defensive armaments are fantasticaly advanced..

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Hotrod
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by an Sinister lord, as a personal vanity project.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Hotrod
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by an Sinister lord, as a personal vanity project.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Terminator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was created by Sinister Forces, to serve in their close combat vanguard.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Space Sinister
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by The Sinister Forces, to quickly attack vulnerable targets at close range.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Space Sinister Gun Yacht
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by a Sinister, as a personal vanity project.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Enforcer Star Ship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by The Sinister Forces, to quickly cripple fleeing or closing ships.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Starship Prototype
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by Sinister researchers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Star Cruiser
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by an Sinister Star Ship yard, in in the traditional style of a military star cruiser.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Space Picket Ship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by Sinister Forces, to protect their space battleships from enemy star destroyers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Canibalized Star Sinister
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by The Sinister Forces, as a heavy destroyer, but most of her weapon systems have been reasigned to other craft.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Personal Craft
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by an Sinister Knight, as a personal vanity project.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Enforcer Cruiser
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by The Sinister Forces, to hopefully cripple fleeing or closing ships.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Disappointing Starship Prototype
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by Sinister researchers. She hasn't lived up tho her creator's expectations.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Star Cruiser
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by an Sinister starship fatory, in in the traditional style of a military star cruiser.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by Sinister Forces, to protect their space battleships from enemy star destroyers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Scout Ship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has a cryptic origin, shrouded in mystery. Her hull configuration is lightweight, but integrates Ultra level technology.\n Some say she was sent back from a terrible future that must never come to pass.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has a cryptic origin, shrouded in mystery. Her hull configuration is midweight and designed to attack smaller ships, but integrates Ultra level technology.\n Some say she was sent back from a terrible future that must never come to pass.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Guardian
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has a cryptic origin, shrouded in mystery. Her hull configuration is small, but heavily armed and integrates Ultra level technology.\n Some say she was sent back from a terrible future that must never come to pass.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Gunship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has a cryptic origin, shrouded in mystery. Her hull configuration is midweight, but heavily armed and integrates Ultra level technology.\n Some say she was sent back from a terrible future that must never come to pass.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister War Ship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has a cryptic origin, shrouded in mystery. Her hull configuration is large and heavily armed, but lightly armored and integrates Ultra level technology.\n Some say she was sent back from a terrible future that must never come to pass.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sinister Artillery Ship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has a cryptic origin, shrouded in mystery. Her massive hull bristles with artillery./n Some say she was sent back from a terrible future that must never come to pass.
